name: Traffic Racing: Behind the Wheel
description:
Race through fast highway traffic with a view from the drivers viewpoint.

Tilt your phone to drive across lanes and avoid crashing.

Touch gas to speed up and brake to slow down.

How long can you drive before crashing? Try to get the highest score in the global leaderboard.

Earn credits by driving fast past others and use them to unlock great other fast cars and driving locations.
